changeSet.author: andrzej.folga@hmcts.net
changeSet.sql: UPDATE complex_field SET label='Payment Total' where reference='PaymentTotal';

column.name: field_type_id
column.valueComputed: (select id from field_type where reference = 'Text' and version = 1 and jurisdiction_id is null)
